name: Mid-century_Blue_Linen_Wing_Chair_
reviews: THE COLOR BLUE IS TRUE TO MY COMPUTER. I WOULD HAVE GIVEN IT A 5 STAR BUT THE CHAIR IS VERY STIFF TO SIT ON. I KNEW THAT BEFORE BUYING IT, SO IT DIDN'T DETER ME. I'M HOPING IT WILL SOFTEN OVERTIME. IT IS SMALLER THAN I EXPECTED, BUT FOR AN ACCENT CHAIR THAT'S FINE.
Perfect and easy to put together. Hard seat but looks great. The color is amazing.
I like the look of the chair. However, the cushion doesn't seem like it fits very snug/flush to the back of the chair.
Beautiful chairs to look at but very hard and not cozy at all.
This chair looks awesome in our living room. The color matches the picture and it was simple to put together. It is a very very FIRM chair.

Very uncomfortable to sit on and the color is very dull. As bad was the way the chair was delivered. left on the front of my property on top of a plant in a neighborhood where there is a lot of burglary. Couldn't carry the box in by myself. Had to take it out of the box on the lawn and drag it into the house.
description:
Play up a retro style or go fully modern with this comfortable blue
arm chair. Featuring mid-century design elements, this eye-catching
upholstered chair boasts tapered round wood legs, linen-look fabric
and a curved, button-tufted back. This stylish wingback chair is
practical, too, with a sturdy wooden frame and non-marking floor
glides. Materials: Solid wood, plywood, fabric, foamFinish: Medium walnut finishUpholstery color: Navy linen-look fabricRound tapered legsButton tufting detail on chair backNon-marking foot glidesUpholstery fill: FoamSeat dimensions: 17 inches high x 23 inches wide x 22.5
  inches deepDimensions: 34 inches high x 33 inches wide x 31 inches
  deepStyleContemporary, Mid-CenturyMaterialFabric, Foam, Linen, WoodChair TypeAccent Chairs, Arm Chairs, Wingback ChairsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightStandardColorBlueFurniture PatternSolid
